long_description: Sporting warm insulation and subtle style, the waterproof women's 686 Mannual Knock insulated jacket won't let stormy weather take the fun out of a day of snowboarding. INFIDRY-8(TM) breathable waterproof coating complements 100g polyester insulation in the body to deliver good weather protection and warmth in most winter condtions. Hood and sleeves have 60g insulation for a balance of warmth and good range of movement. Critical seams are taped for added weather protection. Flip the hood up and pull on the drawcords keep snow and wind from getting in. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. Zippered hand pockets and a sleeve cargo pocket keep all your essentials close at hand. 686 Mannual Knock insulated jacket is rated to keep you warm from about -5degF to 32degF. Snowboarding and skiing require a lot of movement and the 686 Mannual Knock insulated jacket has an All-Access fit that has enough room to accommodate your every move.
short_description: Sporting warm insulation and subtle style, the waterproof women's 686 Mannual Knock insulated jacket won't let stormy weather take the fun out of a day of snowboarding.
